Detailed Description

cfs_hash_bucket is a container of:

  • lock, counter .

..

  • array of hash-head starting from hsb_head[0], hash-head can be one of . struct cfs_hash_head . struct cfs_hash_head_dep . struct cfs_hash_dhead . struct cfs_hash_dhead_dep which depends on requirement of user
  • some extra bytes (caller can require it while creating hash)
